bioimg.base.write_image¶

bioimg.base.write_image(img, path, z=0, c=0, size_c=1, size_z=1, channel_names=None)¶
Parameters
imgnp.array

Image array to write

pathstring

Path where to save the image

zint

Indicate which optical section (z-axis) to write to

cint

Indicate which color channel to write to

size_cint

Total number of color channels

size_zint

Total number of optical sections (z-stack)

bioimg.base.load_image_series

Next topic

bioimg.base.write_imgstack
